channel.title: Error loging in hmmm.. help please ( doveyscape )
channel.description:
:mad:
no error's on compile (compile working fine) no error's on runserver (when i 1st run it)
i open up moparscape.. port 5555 login as usall, and then do my user: pass: but when i try to login on my runserver a message comes up into runserver..
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1260 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 800 at Player.<init>(Player.java:47) at client.<init>(client.java:8413) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:148) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
and now no one can login and i cant even login please help me thankyou so mutch if you do.. reward might be given... please..

item.title: Error loging in hmmm.. help please ( doveyscape )
item.dc:creator: @dovey dovey
item.description:
@dovey wrote:

thanks for tying every one but ermm 1. nothing comes up when i press crtl G[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 05:18:10 PM[/size][hr]i can now crt g
found there line 47 but its…

		bankItems[i] = 0;		} ((line 47))

	for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank item amounts
		bankItemsN[i] = 0;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
		playerEquipment[i] = -1;
		playerEquipmentN[i] = 0;
	}
            //playerItems[0] = 996;
            //playerItemsN[0] = 500000;
            //Perhaps by quoting the above out it will stop resetting users before loading, so the user can't be reset,
            //also making the playerName equal the player id it stops it from saving unless a savedgame was loaded... 
            //tried, first thing i heard was "lmao i got reset for the 3rd time!"...ffs!
              [br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 05:27:27 PM[/size][hr] :confused: :( i arnt going to get this sorted out :(

im not gonna get this done aww

Read full topic

item.title: Error loging in hmmm.. help please ( doveyscape )
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

dovey:

how do i find line 47… im not going to count i got a headake. (and it doesnt work for any person)

Press Ctrl + G and type in 47. ;).
